thread.title: Kim Kardashian Is ALL ABOUT Husband Kanye West Performing At The Next Super Bowl!
thread.title_full: Kim Kardashian Is ALL ABOUT Husband Kanye West Performing At The Next Super Bowl!

author: Perez Hilton
title: Kim Kardashian Is ALL ABOUT Husband Kanye West Performing At The Next Super Bowl!
text:
2/06/2017 11:14 AM ET | Filed under: Music Minute • Kanye West • Kim Kardashian • Twitter • Football • NFL • Super Bowl • KUWTK 
Is everything back to normal for Kimye? 
The end of 2016 was certainly rough for Kim Kardashian West and Kanye West as the KUWTK starlet was robbed at gun point and then her man was hospitalized amid a breakdown . However, despite rumors that they've had problems in their marriage, Mrs. West seemed more than pumped about the idea of Yeezus performing at Super Bowl LII . 
Related: Kim K. Used To Cheat On Tests In School! 
Looks like Kimmie's still pretty dedicated to her marriage! 
Anywho, after the twosome attended a viewing party for the big game on Sunday, the reality TV vet took to Twitter and shared TWO fans posts about 'Ye being a candidate for next year's halftime show. The mother-of-two posted: 
Still, it seems not everyone is on board with the idea of West hitting the halftime stage. In fact, it's pretty safe to say the reviews about the hitmaker (maybe) performing at Super Bowl LII are mixed (below).
